steps.title: Download an independent email management tool that has a bouncing feature.
steps.content: Download an independent email management tool that has a bouncing feature. Two free programs that are popular to use are MailWasher and Bounce Bully. Visit http://www.mailwasher.net/ to download MailWasher.

steps.title: Run the file you downloaded and follow the instructions on the installer to install the program.
steps.content: Run the file you downloaded and follow the instructions on the installer to install the program.

steps.title: Open your email program, and then start up your new MailWasher or Bounce Bully program.
steps.content: Open your email program, and then start up your new MailWasher or Bounce Bully program. If you are using MailWasher, be sure to turn off automatic sending and receiving of emails in your email program if the feature is available.

steps.title: Click the "Check Mail" icon to receive the incoming emails that are waiting on the server.
steps.content: Click the "Check Mail" icon to receive the incoming emails that are waiting on the server. Click on a message that you wish to bounce back to the sender.

steps.title: Right-click on the message and choose the "Mark for bouncing (B)" option.
steps.content: Right-click on the message and choose the "Mark for bouncing (B)" option. Do this on as many messages as you want to bounce.

steps.title: Press the "Process Mail" button to complete the bouncing process when you are finished selecting messages.
steps.content: Press the "Process Mail" button to complete the bouncing process when you are finished selecting messages.

steps.title: Click on the "Message" tab in Bounce Bully.
steps.content: Click on the "Message" tab in Bounce Bully. Drag and drop the message you want to bounce from your email program into the Bounce Bully application.

steps.title: Select the "Config" tab if you want to configure the message that the spammer will receive.
steps.content: Select the "Config" tab if you want to configure the message that the spammer will receive. Make changes to the Postmaster account name, subject line, and message if desired.

steps.title: Click the "Bounce" button to bounce the email back to the spammer with your customized message.
steps.content: Click the "Bounce" button to bounce the email back to the spammer with your customized message.

steps.title: For Gmail users:
steps.content: For Gmail users: If you use Google Chrome, you can bounce emails with Block Sender for Gmail . Download from the Google Chrome Store

steps.title: Once added, go to Gmail.
steps.content: Once added, go to Gmail. Open a message you would like to bounce and press the Block Button and Respond with error message option. (This only works with the paid version.)

steps.title: A bounce message will be sent automatically to the sender.
steps.content: A bounce message will be sent automatically to the sender. Then the sender's mail will be filtered to your trash.

steps.title: To undo the filter, go to Settings and delete the filter.
steps.content: To undo the filter, go to Settings and delete the filter.
